For recommendations provided during postpartum, these professionals are: midwives (49%),  
obstetricians/gynaecologists (40%), general practitioners (38%) and nurses (38%) (Fig. 7.5). However, it 
appears that their training in nutrition may be inadequate and the only group that appear to receive adequate 
training are the dietitians/nutritionists.
